scripts.test: dotenv -e .env.test npx prisma migrate deploy && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules dotenv -e .env.test jest --runInBand
scripts.test:watch: docker exec -it backend-dev sh -c "dotenv -e .env.test npx prisma migrate deploy" dotenv -e .env.test && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest --watch --runInBand
scripts.migrations: docker exec -it backend-dev sh -c "dotenv -e .env npx prisma migrate dev"
scripts.seed: docker exec -it backend-dev sh -c "dotenv -e .env npx prisma db seed"
scripts.reset: docker exec -it backend-dev sh -c "dotenv -e .env npx prisma migrate reset"
